channel.title: Help please!
channel.description: Ok so I have a server that I have had online via Hamachi. I know I had it online because I had other people playing it while I was on it. 3 days ago my friend tried getting on my server after he joined my Hamachi Network. Whenever I run my server and let people log on, it says "Error connecting to server" but whenever I try logging in it lets me since I am the host. Why can't anyone log in anymore? Can someone please help me? I have the money to get my VPS today but I don't want to unless I know for sure people will be able to log in. PLEASE HELP ME! Thanks.

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:9, topic:518077”][quote author=GodexCAB link=topic=636342.msg4290264#msg4290264 date=1367088085]

Change the IP in the source, change the IP in the client.

Still won’t work :
[/quote]

Try actually portforwarding your router and not using hamachi, and using your real ip or mask it using no-ip[/quote]

Ok I am using my no-ip and I think I port forwarded correctly, but when I go to canyouseeme.org it says Error: I could not see your service on (MY IP) on port (43594)

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“GodexCAB, post:8, topic:518077”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=636342.msg4290258#msg4290258 date=1367087375]
Change the IP in the source, change the IP in the client.
[/quote]

Still won’t work :[/quote]

Try actually portforwarding your router and not using hamachi, and using your real ip or mask it using no-ip

Read full topic

@system wrote:

Change the IP in the source, change the IP in the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“GodexCAB, post:5, topic:518077”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=636342.msg4290245#msg4290245 date=1367086800]

check the ip of the client you’re sending them and the source

I just did that, it’s all the same. Still, only I can connect. :\

Make sure your LOCAL IP didn’t change.
You know, that 192.168.XXX.XXX one?
If you didn’t set up static IP then it changes here and there
[/quote]

When I go to my client.java and search for 192.168 or even ‘local’ it can’t find anything.[/quote]
You’re brilliant aren’t you.
It’s in your network and sharing.

Read full topic

Ok so I have a server that I have had online via Hamachi. I know I had it online because I had other people playing it while I was on it. 3 days ago my friend tried getting on my server after he joined my Hamachi Network. Whenever I run my server and let people log on, it says “Error connecting to server” but whenever I try logging in it lets me since I am the host. Why can’t anyone log in anymore?
